sqlList.sql: select count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%'

select count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate + 1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%'

select to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS YESTERDATE2, sum(book_price) AS SUMPRICE from t_lm_order t where ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR' and t.BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') AND (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3')) AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%'

select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS YESTERDATE2, sum(book_price) AS SUMPRICE from t_lm_order t where ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR' and t.BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') AND (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3')) AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate + 1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%'

select price_code AS PRICECODE,book_source AS BOOKSOURCE,count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR' and t.BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') and (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3')) AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' group by price_code,book_source order by price_code,book_source

select price_code AS PRICECODE,book_source AS BOOKSOURCE,count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR' and t.BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') and (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3')) AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate + 1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' group by price_code,book_source order by price_code,book_source

select price_code AS PRICECODE,book_source AS BOOKSOURCE,count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where (t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') and (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3' AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND trunc(t.IN_DATE,'dd') = TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' group by price_code,book_source order by price_code,book_source

select price_code AS PRICECODE,book_source AS BOOKSOURCE,count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where (t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') and (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3' AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate , 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate+1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND trunc(t.IN_DATE,'dd') = TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' group by price_code,book_source order by price_code,book_source

select ur.YESTERDATE,ur.COLNMS,NVL(urt.COLT,0) AS COLVALUE from (select to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS YESTERDATE,NVL(PLATFORM_CODE,'OTHER') AS COLNMS from t_lm_user group by PLATFORM_CODE) ur left join (select count(LOGIN_MOBILE) AS COLT,NVL(PLATFORM_CODE,'OTHER') AS COLNMS from t_lm_user where trunc(CREATETIME,'dd') = TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') group by PLATFORM_CODE) urt on ur.COLNMS = urt.COLNMS

select :StartDate AS startDate, :EndDate AS endDate,count(LOGIN_MOBILE) AS COLVALUE,NVL(PLATFORM_CODE,'OTHER') AS COLNMS from t_lm_user where CREATETIME >= TO_DATE(:StartDate || ' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and CREATETIME < TO_DATE(:EndDate || ' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and LOGIN_MOBILE IS NOT NULL group by PLATFORM_CODE union all select :StartDate AS startDate, :EndDate AS endDate,count(id) AS COLVALUE,NVL(PLATFORM_CODE,'OTHER') AS COLNMS from t_lm_user where CREATETIME >= TO_DATE(:StartDate || ' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and CREATETIME < TO_DATE(:EndDate || ' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and LOGIN_MOBILE IS NULL group by PLATFORM_CODE

select :StartDate AS startDate, :EndDate AS endDate,urt.COLNMS,NVL(urt.COLT,0) AS COLVALUE from (select count(LOGIN_MOBILE) AS COLT,NVL(PLATFORM_CODE,'OTHER') AS COLNMS from t_lm_user where CREATETIME >= TO_DATE(:StartDate || ' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and CREATETIME < TO_DATE(:EndDate || ' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by PLATFORM_CODE ) urt
select count(TASK_NAME) AS COLVALUE, TASK_CODE,TASK_NAME AS COLNMS from t_lm_proc_exam where TASK_STATUS=0 group by TASK_CODE,TASK_NAME

select dt.ALTicket,tt.SUTicket from (select count(t.fog_order_num) AS SUTicket from t_lm_order t where ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR' and t.BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') AND (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3')) AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' AND t.ticket_usercode IS NOT NULL) tt , (select count(t.fog_order_num) AS ALTicket from t_lm_order t where TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' AND t.ticket_usercode IS NOT NULL) dt

select dt.ALTicket,tt.SUTicket from (select count(t.fog_order_num) AS SUTicket from t_lm_order t where ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR' and t.BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') AND (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3')) AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate + 1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' AND t.ticket_usercode IS NOT NULL) tt , (select count(t.fog_order_num) AS ALTicket from t_lm_order t where TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate + 1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' AND t.ticket_usercode IS NOT NULL) dt

select price_code AS PRICECODE,count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR' and t.BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') and (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3')) AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' AND t.ticket_usercode IS NOT NULL group by price_code order by price_code

select price_code AS PRICECODE,count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR' and t.BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((t.price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') and (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3')) AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate + 1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' AND t.ticket_usercode IS NOT NULL group by price_code order by price_code

select count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where (t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') and (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3' AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND trunc(t.IN_DATE,'dd') = TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' AND t.ticket_usercode IS NOT NULL

select count(id) AS COLVALUE from t_lm_order t where (t.price_code= 'BAR' OR t.price_code= 'BARB') and (t.FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or t.FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND t.book_status_other <> '3' AND TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate , 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.create_time AND t.create_time <= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate+1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND trunc(t.IN_DATE,'dd') = TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') AND CONTACT_NAME not like '%测试%' AND t.ticket_usercode IS NOT NULL

select count(distinct mobile) AS COLVALUE,:StartDate AS StartDate,:EndDate AS EndDate,use_code from t_lm_user_action where TODAY_LOGIN >= TO_DATE(:StartDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TODAY_LOGIN < TO_DATE(:EndDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and mobile is not null group by use_code union all select count(distinct user_id) AS COLVALUE,:StartDate AS StartDate,:EndDate AS EndDate,use_code from t_lm_user_action where TODAY_LOGIN >= TO_DATE(:StartDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TODAY_LOGIN < TO_DATE(:EndDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and (mobile is null or mobile='') group by use_code

select count(*) as COLVALUE,:StartDate AS StartDate,:EndDate AS EndDate,use_code from ( select NVL(Mobile,'OTHER') AS COLNMS,use_code from t_lm_user_action where TODAY_LOGIN >= TO_DATE(:StartDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TODAY_LOGIN < TO_DATE(:EndDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by Mobile,use_code) group by use_code

select ot.OUSER,nt.NUSER from ( select count(distinct mobile) AS OUSER from t_lm_user_action where TODAY_LOGIN >= TO_DATE(:StartDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TODAY_LOGIN < TO_DATE(:EndDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and mobile is not null ) ot , ( select count(distinct user_id) AS NUSER from t_lm_user_action where TODAY_LOGIN >= TO_DATE(:StartDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TODAY_LOGIN < TO_DATE(:EndDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and (mobile is null or mobile='')) nt

select count(*) as COLVALUE,to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS YESTERDATE,use_code from ( select NVL(Mobile,'OTHER') AS COLNMS,use_code from t_lm_user_action where TRUNC(TODAY_LOGIN,'dd') = TRUNC(SYSDATE-1,'dd') group by Mobile,use_code) group by use_code
